name: ccxt
description: A JavaScript / TypeScript / Python / C# / PHP cryptocurrency trading library with support for 100+ exchanges

scripts.coverage-js: npm run instrument && npm run nyc-coverage && rm -rf jsInstrumented
scripts.csharp: npm run transpileCS && npm run transpileCSWs && npm run buildCS
scripts.go: npm run transpileGO && npm run buildGO
scripts.force-build//WithoutGo: npm run pre-transpile && npm run force-transpile-fast && npm run csharp && npm run post-transpile && npm run update-badges
scripts.force-build: npm run pre-transpile && npm run go && npm run force-transpile-fast && npm run csharp && npm run post-transpile && npm run update-badges
scripts.//TMPCommentforce-build: npm run pre-transpile && npm run force-transpile-fast && npm run csharp && npm run go && npm run post-transpile && npm run update-badges
scripts.tsBuildFile: tsc --skipLibCheck --strictNullChecks false --strict --noImplicitAny false --esModuleInterop --isolatedModules false --forceConsistentCasingInFileNames --removeComments false --target ES2020 --declaration --allowJs --checkJs false --moduleResolution Node --module ES2022 --outDir ./js/src --lib ES2020.BigInt --lib dom
scripts.build: npm run pre-transpile && npm run transpile && npm run post-transpile && npm run update-badges && npm run build-docs
scripts.force-build-slow: npm run pre-transpile && npm run force-transpile && npm run post-transpile && npm run update-badges
scripts.pre-transpile-js: npm run export-exchanges && npm run vss && npm run emitAPITs && npm run tsBuild && npm run validate-types && npm run tsBuildExamples && npm run check-js-syntax && npm run bundle
scripts.pre-transpile-py: npm run export-exchanges && npm run emitAPIPy
scripts.pre-transpile-php: npm run export-exchanges && npm run emitAPIPhp
scripts.pre-transpile-go: npm run export-exchanges && npm run emitAPIGo
scripts.pre-transpile-js-simple: npm run export-exchanges && npm run emitAPITs && tsc && npm run validate-types
scripts.pre-transpile-cs: npm run export-exchanges && npm run emitAPICs
scripts.pre-transpile: npm run export-exchanges && npm run vss && npm run tsBuild && npm run emitAPI && npm run validate-types && npm run tsBuildExamples && npm run copy-python-files && npm run check-js-syntax && npm run bundle
scripts.pre-transpile-pr: npm run export-exchanges && npm run tsBuild && npm run emitAPI && npm run check-js-syntax
scripts.post-transpile: npm run check-python-syntax && npm run check-php-syntax
scripts.transpile: npm run transpileRest && npm run transpileWs
scripts.force-transpile: npm run force-transpileRest && npm run force-transpileWs
scripts.force-transpile-fast-py: npm run fast-force-transpileRest-py && npm run fast-force-transpileWs-py
scripts.force-transpile-fast-php: npm run fast-force-transpileRest-php && npm run fast-force-transpileWs-php
scripts.dev-force-transpile: npm run fast-force-transpileRest && npm run fast-force-transpileWs
scripts.check-syntax: npm run transpile && npm run check-js-syntax && npm run check-python-syntax && npm run check-php-syntax
scripts.check-php-syntax: npm run check-rest-php-syntax && npm run check-ws-php-syntax
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-cjs && npm run bundle-browser
scripts.bundle-browser: webpack build -c webpack.config.js && webpack build -c webpack.config.js --optimization-minimize --output-filename ccxt.browser.min.js
scripts.copy-python-files: npm run copy-python-package && npm run copy-python-license && npm run copy-python-keys && npm run copy-python-readme
scripts.request-py: npm run request-py-sync && npm run request-py-async
scripts.request-php: npm run request-php-sync && npm run request-php-async
scripts.request-go: cd go/ && npm run ti-go -- --requestTests && cd ../
scripts.request-tests//withoutGo: npm run request-js && npm run request-py && npm run request-php && npm run request-cs
scripts.request-tests: npm run request-js && npm run request-py && npm run request-php && npm run request-cs && npm run request-go
scripts.response-py: npm run response-py-sync && npm run response-py-async
scripts.response-go: cd go/ && npm run ti-go  -- --responseTests && cd ../
scripts.response-php: npm run response-php-sync && npm run response-php-async
scripts.response-tests: npm run response-js && npm run response-py && npm run response-php && npm run response-cs && npm run response-go
scripts.response-tests//withoutGo: npm run response-js && npm run response-py && npm run response-php && npm run response-cs
scripts.id-tests: npm run id-tests-js && npm run id-tests-py && npm run id-tests-php && npm run id-tests-cs
scripts.id-tests//withGO: npm run id-tests-js && npm run id-tests-py && npm run id-tests-php && npm run id-tests-cs && npm run id-tests-go
scripts.test-base-rest-go: cd go/ && npm run ti-go  -- --baseTests && cd ../
scripts.test-base-rest: npm run test-base-rest-js && npm run test-base-rest-py && npm run test-base-rest-php && npm run test-base-rest-cs
scripts.test-base-ws: npm run test-base-ws-js   && npm run test-base-ws-py   && npm run test-base-ws-php   && npm run test-base-ws-cs
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run commonjs-test && npm run id-tests && npm run request-tests && npm run response-tests && npm run live-tests
